mapper.sql: id, name, `desc`, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, is_deleted
mapper.insert: insert into flow (id, name, desc, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into flow
id,
name,
`desc`,
create_time,
create_by,
update_time,
update_by,
is_deleted,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mapper.update:
update flow
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update flow set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from flow where 1=1
and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
order by create_time desc limit #{pageNum} , #{pageSize}

select count(1) from flow where 1=1
and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
